item.title: Shravan Mayilan
item.author: Author
item.description: Shravan is a talented young artist who lives with his mom, dad and sister in Orlando, FL. He is overcoming his speech and social skills deficits by creating art. He loves the sensory nature of art and his favorite medium is acrylic. Shravan enjoys painting still-life and landscapes.

item.title: Oranges
item.author: Author
item.description: Won first place in the 2021 Top Talent contest organized by the Foundation for Orange County Public School Events.

item.title: Exceptional Creativity Exhibit at the Lufrano Gallery, UNF
item.author: Author
item.description: Pineapple was on display from June 25, 2021 - August 26, 2021 at the Lufrano Gallery, UNF. The exhibit was organized by Arts4All Florida in partnership with the University of North Florida.

item.title: Family: The Compass That Guides
item.author: Author
item.description: Exciting news! Top 10 finalist the Education Guide of Central Florida art contest has been selected as one of the top 10 finalists!

item.title: Gallery
item.author: Author
item.description: Click here to check out my gallery of artworks
